pinyin: dan1 chun2 pao4 zhen3 bing4 du2

sentences.english: Thymidine kinase gene is found in herpes simplex virus.
sentences.chinese: 胸苷激酶基因被發現在單純皰疹病毒。

sentences.english: We have a right to know if a potential partner has herpes.
sentences.chinese: 我們有權知道潛在的伴侶是否患有皰疹。

sentences.english: FemaleBleb of recrudescent sex genital must make department of gynaecology check in order to divide cancer of husband palace neck.
sentences.chinese: 女性複發性生殖器皰疹須作婦科檢查以除外子宮頸癌。

sentences.english: You don’t want to be dating someone with herpes.
sentences.chinese: 你肯定不想與得皰疹的人約會。

sentences.english: But the clinical lesions share the same features with herpetic vesicles.
sentences.chinese: 但是皰疹病毒形成的水泡也會有相同的臨牀表現。

sentences.english: Conclusion The eye lesions of herpes zoster ophthalmicus were…
sentences.chinese: 結論眼部帶狀皰疹損害廣泛，及時正確治療十分重要。

sentences.english: If you want to avoid herpes, have only one sex partner.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想避免得皰疹，就專注於你現在的性夥伴吧。

sentences.english: Sometimes, people do not exhibit symptoms but are herpes carriers all the same.
sentences.chinese: 那些沒有表現出明顯症狀的皰疹病毒攜帶者比比皆是。

sentences.english: A herpetic ulcer is seen microscopically to have a sharp margin.
sentences.chinese: 皰疹性潰瘍有明顯的界限。

sentences.english: Phototoxic blisters have been reported previously in association with furosemide.
sentences.chinese: 以往曾有呋塞米引起光毒性大皰疹的報道。

sentences.english: As the cold sore becomes visible, small red spots and fluid blisters appear.
sentences.chinese: 當脣皰疹發展到可見的時候，會出現小紅點和水泡。

sentences.english: Tea tree essential oil can also be used has a treatment for cold sores, acne, verrucae and warts.
sentences.chinese: 茶樹精油也可有效治療脣皰疹，痤瘡，肉贅和肉疣。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of flashing-fire moxibustion for herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察閃火灸法治療帶狀皰疹的療效。

sentences.english: Q12. Is there a vaccine to prevent herpes?
sentences.chinese: 有可以預防皰疹的疫苗嗎？

sentences.english: They are usually black colored and have the appearance of normal shingles .
sentences.chinese: 他們通常都是黑色，外觀正常的帶狀皰疹。

sentences.english: Say natively to cure actually, "Internal heat " the expression that is pure sex bleb.
sentences.chinese: 其實對於醫生來說，“火氣”是單純性皰疹的表現。
